component.name: TVShowData
component.script: sub setFields() datum = m.top.full_data m.top.title = datum.name m.top.showID = datum.id if datum.posterURL <> invalid m.top.posterURL = datum.posterURL else m.top.posterURL = "" end if m.top.description = datum.overview 'm.top.seasons = TVSeasons(datum.id) 'm.top.nextup = TVNext(datum.id) end sub
